Articles.Content:
Hi! there is a very funny craft... Why use an airplane when u can use a jetcycle???

There are 2 version, the spider and the coupe.

Both have low range fuel but good speed and handling.

Lets start with the firebolt spider:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions

1-EVA your pilot

2-dont move him

3-just click on the external seat

4-toggle SAS on

5-Fly!

6-for extra speed click 1 (toggle engine nacelle that does airbraking)

7-click 2 for deploy the ladder

HAVE FUN!

DOWNLOAD SPIDER

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/firebolt-spider/

The coupÃƒÂ¨ version:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

No particulary instructions needed just fly!

-1 for toggle nacelle

-2 for deploy ladder

DONWLOAD COUPE

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/firebolt-coupe-2/

WARNING!HARD TO PILOT

Edited January 30, 2014 by eorin
I've made a few "jet cycles", the trick to the handling issues is to keep the air intake right at the back so that drag is a centering force. I've found radial intakes + reaction wheels = success.
Wow nice i tried to make one for manned exploration of laythe
